Thyphon/Elecktra/Charon/Deepfear/Alecto/Blacknightmare/Dragonfly::

Alarms was ringing an all Fortress, and reactions were diferents.


Thypon picked up Preborn and moved towards the Black Fortress. 

In Black Fortress, Alecto cursed and told to Destructor "I  HAVE TO 
GOTTA FIGHT... THAT CORRITOR LEADS TO MESS HALL WHERE DRILLBIT WAS, i 
THINK THAT STILL HE'S THERE... FOLLOW IT!!! SEE YA!"

She ran towards the exit.

Blacknighmare said quickly to Drillbit "Some one it's attaking us... 
wait here I'll go to find out what's going on". the femme ran.

Charon and Deepfear took a tunnel that leaded to surface while 
Elecktra run quickly towards other tunnel.

Dragonfly has troubles to reach the coast, he dificultly could swim.
